Unless other arrangements are made, all butcher dates are reserved with, animals delivered to and meat picked up at Kiko Meats near Minerva, Ohio for processing.

Kiko Meats is located at 1548 Union Ave, Minerva, Ohio

Phone [330-868-6439](tel:1330868-6439)

Processing fees are listed at [Kiko Meat's website](https://www.kikomeatsinc.com/blank-4) and a cut sheet is available here for your reference.
